text: The USS Carney (DDG-64) is the 14th Arleigh Burke-class destroyer in the United States Navy. ==Operational history== On 19 October, 2023, the Carney engaged and shot down 4 cruise missiles and 15 drones launched by the Houthi movement, which is the recognized start of the Red Sea Crisis. During the Red Sea Crisis, the Carney participated in several military operations. ==References== Category:Naval ships of the United States
title: USS Carney
